de.adorsys.keymanagement.keyrotation.config.properties

Class RotationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.adorsys.keymanagement.keyrotation.config.properties.RotationConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyRotationConfig

    @Configuration
 @ConfigurationProperties(prefix="rotation")
public class RotationConfiguration
extends Object
implements KeyRotationConfig

        public Map<KeyType,GeneratedKeyTemplate> getKeyTemplate()

        Which algorithms are associated with a key - i.e. Secret key for AES-256 encryption.

      • getCountValidByType

        public Map<KeyType,Integer> getCountValidByType()
        Count of valid keys in keystore by the type. I.e. rotation: count-valid-by-type: SIGNING: 3 Will force keystore to have 3 valid signing keys.
        Specified by:
        getCountValidByType in interface KeyRotationConfig

      • getKeyTemplates

        public SimpleKeyTemplate getKeyTemplates()
        Key template for each type. Can be used to change encryption algorithm or key size. I.e. rotation: key-templates: secret: algo: AES size: 128 means that KeyStore will be filled with AES-128 secret keys.

      • getValidity

        public Duration getValidity()
        Duration for key to be valid (valid key can be used for encryption and decryption).
        Specified by:
        getValidity in interface KeyRotationConfig

      • getLegacy

        public Duration getLegacy()
        Duration for key to be legacy (legacy key can be used only for decryption).
        Specified by:
        getLegacy in interface KeyRotationConfig

      • getLockAtMost

        public Duration getLockAtMost()
        Key rotation lock validity interval. Key rotation should be done faster than this value.

      • getKeystore

        public KeyStoreSecurityConfig getKeystore()
        Configures KeyStore security.

      • setCountValidByType

        public void setCountValidByType(Map<KeyType,Integer> countValidByType)
        Count of valid keys in keystore by the type. I.e. rotation: count-valid-by-type: SIGNING: 3 Will force keystore to have 3 valid signing keys.

      • setKeyTemplates

        public void setKeyTemplates(SimpleKeyTemplate keyTemplates)
        Key template for each type. Can be used to change encryption algorithm or key size. I.e. rotation: key-templates: secret: algo: AES size: 128 means that KeyStore will be filled with AES-128 secret keys.

      • setValidity

        public void setValidity(Duration validity)
        Duration for key to be valid (valid key can be used for encryption and decryption).

      • setLegacy

        public void setLegacy(Duration legacy)
        Duration for key to be legacy (legacy key can be used only for decryption).

      • setLockAtMost

        public void setLockAtMost(Duration lockAtMost)
        Key rotation lock validity interval. Key rotation should be done faster than this value.

      • setKeystore

        public void setKeystore(KeyStoreSecurityConfig keystore)
        Configures KeyStore security.
